item.title: I don't want better goal kicking accuracy in the AFL
item.description: Update: There is far less of a relationship between goal accuracy and margin than originally published - I’ve fixed the error in code below which was using Away.Points instead of Away.Behinds in calculating goal-kicking accuracy. Today I practice ggplot2 and investigate skills in the AFL. The #AFLWonkWednesdays week 2 topic is; What is going on with skills? There has been a lot of chatter about the quality of skills and goal kicking in the AFL of late.
